- Answer all questions.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 451, 761, 466]]<|/det|>
- Use a black or dark blue pen. You may use an HB pencil for any diagrams or graphs.

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 467, 808, 482]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 499, 478, 512]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 515, 361, 528]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 530, 483, 544]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 578, 664, 608]]<|/det|>
